head_title.title: Revolutionize Your Business Framework
head_title.subtitle: Streamline operations and boost efficiency with our comprehensive SME solutions

cases.description: Every business activity is subject to countless regulations. There is no way to avoid the digitization of filing and processes - this is already provided for in the Commercial Code in conjunction with the Tax Code (GoBD + Elster), the social security reporting portal and a number of other systems that you are obliged to use.
We focus on supporting small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in particular with practical measures in a cost-effective and effective manner.

A process documentation documents for you how your filing and processes are organized. At the same time, this guide helps you to keep track of things in your day-to-day life when integrating email, apps, software packages, receipts, and more from many sources.

bloc_2.title: Your Computer in the Center
bloc_2.cases_1: Ensuring the auditability of your documents while using cost-effective cloud services and Internet apps is why we put your computer at the center. Many things can change over the years, but your archive should stay with you .
bloc_2.cases_2: Traceable, complete, unchanged, access-protected, digitally verifiable are just some of the keywords from the specifications with which we can support you.
bloc_2.cases_3: Our principle of indexing and building metadata in JSON format maintains your independence.

cases.description: You can always use the mix of software & apps that you need for your business.
Mobile devices, computers, operating systems and applications work together like an orchestra when you do your work in the company.

With a Coverflex Project account, you can create your own profiles on your PC to control workflows . You coordinate the circulation and flow of documents, their processing and filing. You can use ready-made apps for this - from many providers via their APIs or import/export functions
